about_the_game:
Explore Freely


In Revamped, you will have to explore a manor and find new ways to defeat your enemies. The exploration is non linear, and you can go where you want in the order you wish. Be wary though, as enemies can be trickier at some places than in others...

Revamp Yourself


While exploring, you will find power ups that will drastically change the way you play, explore and apprehend the trickiest situations. The gameplay will evolve as will you.

Recollect


During your adventure, you will find bits and pieces of lore here and there that will help you have a better understanding of the world and the overall story. And if you only want to shoot things, you don't have to read anything don't you worry.

Fight Screen Filling Bosses


You will encounter mighty bosses that will get bigger and greater than the last. You'll need to gather all your strength and intellect to beat them as you'll have to use different strategies during those encounters.

Replay


At the end the credits roll, but the show must go on. Now that you made the trip in one piece or so, you can complete the game again and again in different modes, exploring areas and beating bosses in different orders. It is one game yet it has multiple facets, are you willing to discover them all?
